channel.title: How to edit the xp you get for each skill
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering if you could tell me where to change how much XP you get for each skill. Example: How to change how much xp you get for catching a shrimp or How to change how much xp you get for hitting on a monster using melee.
Thanks!

item.title: How to edit the xp you get for each skill
item.dc:creator: @easternbikes easternbikes
item.description:
@easternbikes wrote:

Thanks I appreciate the help (:

One more question, how can I add rocks you can mine to a specific location?

Oh and where do I change how much xp you get for fishing etc?

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit the xp you get for each skill

item.title: How to edit the xp you get for each skill
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

client.java look for TotalExp = (double) should see it there, code[/code] the number is the amount of exp multiplied by the amount you hit.

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit the xp you get for each skill
item.dc:creator: @Epicskillz Epicskillz
item.description:
@Epicskillz wrote:

Use the Java file searcher thing, make sure you dont add capitals to things which dont have them eg;

Dont search for “Playerrights” and search “PlayerRights”
